isis.stitle: CF 500, CF 600 Transmission - Automatic Transaxle/Transmission External Controls - Diagnosis and Testing

svcprocinfo.para: Refer to the Wiring Diagrams for schematic and connector information.

step1.para: Verify the customer concern by operating the transmission external control.
Visually inspect for obvious signs of mechanical or electrical damage. Refer to the following chart.
If the fault is not visually evident, determine the symptom. GO to Symptom Chart.

entry.para: The shift interlock system does not release/lock correctly
The shift control is out of correct gear relationship
The transmission range indicator does not correspond to the gear

item.para: Transmission shift cable loose from the transmission bracket.
INSTALL a new transmission shift cable.
VERIFY the shift cable is seated in the transmission shift cable bracket.
VERIFY the transmission shift cable adjustment. REFER to Selector Lever Cable Adjustment in this section.

entry.para: The transmission range indicator lamp does not illuminate
REFER to Instrument Cluster and Panel Illumination in S08307.
The tow/haul switch/indicator lamp not operating correctly
Rattle, noise, buzz or other noise

item.para: SECURE the grommet to dash panel.

entry.para: INSTALL a new transmission shift cable.
The transmission range selector lever will not shift from range

item.para: INSTALL a new transmission shift cable.

table.title: PINPOINT TEST A: THE SHIFT INTERLOCK SYSTEM DOES NOT RELEASE/LOCK CORRECTLY

item.para: Apply the brake pedal and view the brake lights.

para.emph: Is the resistance 5 ohms or less?
A3 TEST CIRCUIT 10 (LG/RD) FOR A SHORT TO GROUND

item.para: Measure the resistance of circuit 10 (LG/RD) at C278 pin 4.

para.emph: Is the resistance 10,000 ohms or less?

entry.para: SERVICE circuit 10 (LG/RD) for short to ground. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: A4 TEST CIRCUIT 10 (LG/RD) FOR AN OPEN

item.para: Measure the resistance between the output side of fuse 10 (20A) and brake pedal position switch C278 pin 4, circuit 10 (LG/RD).

para.emph: Is the resistance 5 ohms or less?

entry.para: SERVICE circuit 10 (LG/RD) for open. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: A5 TEST THE BRAKE PEDAL POSITION SWITCH

item.para: Measure the resistance of the brake pedal position switch while open (OFF) and closed (ON).

para.emph: Is the resistance of switch greater than 10,000 ohms while OFF and 5 ohms or less while ON?

entry.para: INSTALL a new brake pedal position switch. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: A6 TEST CIRCUIT 511 (LG) FOR SHORT TO GROUND

item.para: Disconnect: Brake Pedal Position Switch C278.
Measure the resistance of circuit 511 (LG), C3245 pin A.

para.emph: Is the resistance 10,000 ohms or less?

entry.para: SERVICE circuit 511 (LG) for short to ground. TEST the system for normal operation.

item.para: Measure the resistance of circuit 511 (LG) between shift lock actuator C3245 pin A and brake pedal position switch C278 pin 3.

para.emph: Is the resistance 5 ohms or less?

entry.para: SERVICE circuit 511 (LG) for open. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: A8 TEST THE SHIFT LOCK ACTUATOR

item.para: Measure the resistance of shift lock actuator between C3245 pin A and pin B.

para.emph: Is continuity present and the resistance greater than 0 ohms?

entry.para: INSTALL a new shift lock actuator. REFER to Brake Shift Interlock Actuator in this section. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: A9 TEST CIRCUIT 22 (LB/BK) FOR AN OPEN

item.para: Measure the resistance of circuit 22 (LB/BK) between selector lever C3245 pin B and TCM C168 pin 72.

para.emph: Is the resistance less than 5 ohms?

entry.para: INSTALL a new TCM. TEST the system for normal operation.
SERVICE circuit 22 (LB/BK) for an open. TEST the system for normal operation.

table.title: PINPOINT TEST B: PINPOINT TEST B: THE SHIFT CONTROL IS OUT OF CORRECT GEAR RELATIONSHIP

para.emph: B1 CHECK THE SHIFT CONTROL LINKAGE

item.para: Gain access to the shift control linkage.
Actuate the transmission range selector lever in all ranges.

entry.para: INSTALL new shift control linkage. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: B2 CHECK THE TRANSMISSION SHIFT CABLE

item.para: Check transmission shift cable and bracket installation and tightness.

para.emph: Is the transmission shift cable correctly installed and adjusted?

entry.para: VERIFY the transmission shift cable adjustment. REFER to Selector Lever Cable Adjustment in this section. ADJUST the transmission shift cable if necessary.
REPAIR as necessary. TEST the system for normal operation.

table.title: PINPOINT TEST C: PINPOINT TEST C: THE TOW/HAUL SWITCH/INDICATOR LAMP NOT OPERATING CORRECTLY

item.para: Check the power distribution center fuse F35 (20A).

para.emph: Is the resistance less than 5 ohms?

entry.para: REINSTALL the fuse. GO to C3.
INSTALL a new fuse. TEST the system for normal operation. If the fuse fails again, GO to C2.

para.emph: C2 TEST CIRCUIT 3049 (BK/LG) FOR A SHORT TO GROUND

item.para: Measure the resistance of circuit 3049 (BK/LG) at the output side of power distribution box fuse F35 (20A).

para.emph: Is the resistance greater than 10,000 ohms?

entry.para: SERVICE circuit 3049 (BK/LG) for short to ground. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: C3 TEST CIRCUIT 3049 (BK/LG) FOR AN OPEN

item.para: Measure the resistance between output side of power distribution box fuse F35 (20A) and ignition relay pin 30 circuit 3049 (BK/LG).

para.emph: Is the resistance less than 5 ohms?

entry.para: TEST the ignition relay. REFER to the Wiring Diagrams for component testing. GO to C4.
SERVICE circuit 3049 (BK/LG) for an open. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: C4 TEST CIRCUIT 489 (PK/BK) FOR A SHORT TO GROUND

item.para: Measure the resistance of circuit 489 (PK/BK) at the ignition relay pin 87.

para.emph: Is the resistance greater than 10,000 ohms?

entry.para: SERVICE circuit 489 (PK/BK) for a short to ground. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: C5 TEST CIRCUIT 489 (PK/BK) FOR AN OPEN

item.para: Measure the resistance of circuit 489 (PK/BK) between C3245 pin C and ignition relay pin 87.

para.emph: Is the resistance less than 5 ohms?

entry.para: SERVICE circuit 489 (PK/BK) for an open. TEST the system for normal operation.

item.para: Measure the resistance between C3245 pin C and pin D while opened and closed.

para.emph: Is the resistance of the switch greater than 10,000 ohms while opened and 5 ohms or less while closed?

entry.para: INSTALL a new selector lever. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: C7 TEST CIRCUIT 224 (TN/WH) FOR A SHORT TO GROUND

item.para: Measure the resistance of circuit 224 (TN/WH) at C3245 pin D.

para.emph: Is the resistance greater than 10,000 ohms?

entry.para: SERVICE circuit 224 (TN/WH) for a short to ground. TEST the system for normal operation.

para.emph: C8 TEST CIRCUIT 224 (TN/WH) FOR AN OPEN

item.para: Measure the resistance of circuit 224 (TN/WH) between shifter lever C3245 pin D and TCM C168 pin 78.

para.emph: Is the resistance less than 5 ohms?

entry.para: INSTALL a new TCM. TEST the system for normal operation.
SERVICE circuit 224 (TN/WH) for an open. TEST the system for normal operation.
